issue.title: segfault when calling ipopt virtual method

content.raw:
I wrote the following in https://github.com/simbody/simbody/issues/510 in response to Silvio:

> Our only plan is to make a release of Simbody just before OpenSim 4.0 is released in the next few months. If you need a release sooner, we can ask @sherm1 what he thinks. I'm happy to go through the steps of creating the release.
content.html:
I wrote the following in https://github.com/simbody/simbody/issues/510 in response to Silvio:

Our only plan is to make a release of Simbody just before OpenSim 4.0 is released in the next few months. If you need a release sooner, we can ask @sherm1 what he thinks. I'm happy to go through the steps of creating the release.
